availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Logan Forbis (Green County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Lane Forbis. Father of Mary Forbis, Margaret J. Forbis, Benjamin S. Forbis, William L. Forbis, Horace C. Forbis and David G. Forbis. Married to Hannah Forbis. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1840. Brick mason in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Southern Division, p. 167.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 614.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Deaths.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 52-12298.
